websiteHeaderMenuText: Journal of thoughts, ideas, life experiences and media dump

contents.value: Hello I am Aniket. I work as a backend developer in finance sector. In my free time I like to try new skills and hobbies and this website is one of my latest endeavors. I have created this website as a medium to express myself creatively, be it designing the website itself or sharing writings, pictures and other media. Some of my other hobbies include football both playing and watching, swimming and jogging.
